derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French envoyé, past participle of envoyer 'send', from en voie 'on the way', based on Latin via 'way'

encyclopedia.content: 美国通用汽车GMC品牌中的商用车系列。GMC除了envoy(使节）外，还有有savana、峡谷（canyon）、西拉（sierra）育空河（yukon）、旅行（safari）等一系列车型。 06款 envoy 参数 标准引擎 4.2L/直列六缸/双顶置凸轮轴/多点电子燃油喷射/前纵置发动机 标准变速器 自动 4档 标准排量 4162 cc 气 门 数 24 最大功率 217/6000 KW/rpm 最大扭矩 277/4800 N·m/rpm 燃油系统 电子燃油喷射式 理论油耗 升/百公里 最高时速 km/h 加速时间 秒

entry.def: An envoy is someone who is sent as a representative from one government or political group to another.
An envoy is a diplomat in an embassy who is immediately below the ambassador in rank.

means.word_mean: 1. a diplomat having less authority than an ambassador
2. someone sent on a mission to represent the interests of someone else
3. a brief stanza concluding certain forms of poetry

sentences.en: a special envoy from the American president
A special peace envoy was sent to the area.

sentences.en: He served as envoy to the French government.

sentences.en: The government has not yet appointed an envoy to the area.
